name: Medical Toolkit (Standard TL-4)
description: Modern medical tools containing drugs, resuscitation equipment, surgical supplies, and diagnostic materials. The kit is sufficient for both minor and serious wounds, and it can be used for the treatment of animal injuries, radiation burns, chemical burns, poisoning, and drug overdoses. TL 9+ versions include Skin Glue, which stops surface wounds and accelerates the healing process better than antibiotics and bandages.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
